author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

The goal of this PR is to introduce a dedicated DQM sequence for HLT nano (`nanohltDQM`).
For this purpose a stub of configuration for the `hltNanoDQM` module is introduced as well as a unit test (unfortunately it's not possible to add the DQM step to run within the `ph2_hlt` matrix, with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48976 blocking this development).
I profit of this PR to provide a minimal clean-up of the plugins in the `HLTrigger/NGTScouting` package (commit 8040d7cacd8ffa626001beeb5c9952d350639098), as well as offering the possibility to have the booking of the top directory of the `NanoAODDQM` module configurable (b676512c0f1ca8bad9037a16fa78a3af3b9b5029)

#### PR validation:

`scram b runtests_testProduceNanoHLT`

runs fine.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: [NGT] Introduce DQM for HLT nano
